FirstPage.title: Business Agro touristique
FirstPage.description: Experience the richness of rural life through immersive farm visits, nature exploration, and authentic local traditions designed to reconnect you with nature.

hero.title: Traditional Cheese
hero.description: A traditional cheese production farm (fromage artisanal) that uses high-quality local products, herbs, and oils. The project is based on producing fresh milk from a herd of high-quality dairy cows, which is then transformed into various types of cheese using traditional or semi-industrial methods, such as fresh or aged cheeses. The cheese is made using milking equipment, a pasteurization and curdling unit, and temperature- and humidity-controlled aging rooms. The project focuses on quality, hygiene, and the local character of the product, giving it added value in high-end markets. The cheese is marketed directly at the farm, as well as through shops, hotels, and specialty markets. Regarding sanitary conditions, all health regulations must be respected. This farm specializes in producing natural and artisanal local products using local herbs and oils.

products.title: Goat Cheese
products.description: Soft, tangy, and perfect for salads or as a spread.

products.title: Aged Tomme
products.description: Firm and nutty, aged for a deep, complex flavor.

products.title: Fresh Ricotta
products.description: Creamy and delicate, ideal for desserts and pastries.

catering.title: Catering Services
catering.description: Our catering service brings the authentic taste of the farm directly to your table. We create fresh, healthy dishes using our own farm-made cheeses, organic herbs, and local oils. Each recipe is inspired by traditional techniques and crafted to highlight natural flavors and seasonal ingredients. Whether you're hosting a rustic event, a countryside retreat, or a gourmet experience, our farm-to-table catering adds a distinctive, artisanal touch that reflects the values of sustainability, quality, and local tradition.

bungalow.title: Stay in Our Bungalows
bungalow.description: A bungalow is a type of simple dwelling, often built from wood, consisting of a single floor with an outdoor porch. It is characterized by its practical and comfortable design and is typically used as temporary accommodation in tourist areas such as beaches or mountains. Bungalows offer a peaceful and natural environment for relaxation, making them a popular choice in campsites and summer resorts.

hero.title: Animal Husbandry
hero.description: An animal husbandry farm for meat production raises livestock like cattle, sheep, goats, chickens, and turkeys using scientific methods focused on nutrition, veterinary care, and welfare, offering fresh red and white meat served in a modern on-site restaurant with beautifully designed wooden facilities.

products.title: Fresh Milk
products.description: Pure, fresh milk from grass-fed cows and goats.

products.title: Organic Eggs
products.description: Farm-fresh organic eggs, rich in nutrients.

catering.title: Catering Services
catering.description: It is a sector dedicated to preparing and serving food, and it gains a distinctive character when it relies on organic and natural products. In the context of a traditional cheese production farm, la restauration involves offering dishes made with high-quality fresh milk cheeses, enhanced with natural local herbs and oils. These organic products are used to prepare healthy recipes with a local flair, giving restaurants and hotels an authentic touch and increasing the appeal of the dishes served. This makes la restauration a key partner in promoting artisanal agriculture and natural products.

hero.title: aquaculture farm
hero.description: An aquaculture farm is a specialized facility for raising edible aquatic species like tilapia, salmon, and shrimp or ornamental fish like koi in controlled environments such as ponds, tanks, or cages, using precise techniques for water purification, feeding, and health monitoring to ensure quality, safety, and sustainability.

products.description: Farm-fresh organic eggs, rich in nutrients.

hero.title: red fruit farm
hero.description: A red fruit farm specializes in cultivating strawberries, raspberries, blackberries, cherries, and prunes in climate-controlled greenhouses using modern techniques like drip irrigation and biological pest monitoring to produce high-quality, chemical-free organic fruits, along with natural derivatives like traditional organic jam, contributing to food security and the local economy.

hero.title: honey-producing farm
hero.description: A honey farm is an agricultural unit specialized in beekeeping, raising bees in managed hives to produce natural honey and by-products like beeswax, pollen, and propolis, using scientific methods to ensure quality and sustainability, while supporting pollination, crop yields, and rural development.

hero.title: edible mushroom farm
hero.description: An edible mushroom farm is an agricultural production unit specialized in cultivating fungi for human consumption—such as button (Agaricus bisporus), oyster (Pleurotus spp), and reishi mushrooms—in controlled environments with regulated humidity, temperature, and ventilation, using organic substrates like straw or sterilized sawdust to produce high-quality mushrooms for fresh use, drying, or commercial sale.
